channel.title: [Help] Client and Servers 508, NPC's and Item's don't spawn
channel.description:
[ Tittle ] Npc's Don't spawn spawn at all, Items don't spawn on ground and prayer don't really work
[ Extra ] Well i can open the server and client but when i go in there are no NPC spawned or items. Its on Any 508 server.
i have the cache 508 in "C/cache508/rs/"
Is there anything about that or something else.
[ Extra 2 ] I tried it on 3 servers so far and no worky

item.title: [Help] Client and Servers 508, NPC's and Item's don't spawn
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

Set up environmental variables properly!
Check the client is reading the correct CFG file!
Make sure you use the correct version because not all 508s are coded the same
DONT USE PALINDO Client use something with its own cache within the folder!

Read full topic
item.source: [Help] Client and Servers 508, NPC's and Item's don't spawn

item.title: [Help] Client and Servers 508, NPC's and Item's don't spawn
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

I would suggest stacking to 317 server, and using 503 or 508 as a client, MUCH easyer

Read full topic
